item.title: EP 840 - Ansel Adams Vs. The Wolf Ape!
item.itunes:title: Ansel Adams Vs. The Wolf Ape!
item.description:
Today we find out witnessing a paranormal event can lead to legal repercussions, and then we get attacked by the Wolf Ape of Fresno Valley!

 

Fan Art Friday artwork by Chyme Chili
